lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee (IOC) has confirmed the eligibility of Russian golfer Maria Verchenova to compete at the Rio Olympic Games, the International Golf Federation (IGF) said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: IOC Clears Russia's Verchenova to Compete at Rio: IGF
headline.main: IOC Clears Russia's Verchenova to Compete at Rio: IGF
